mapper.select: SELECT ra_name, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{param1}, #{param2}), POINT(lng, lat)) AS distance FROM ccu.restarea_Info ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 2;
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(id, pw, email, phone, sms_receiver,joindate,user_type,name) values(#{id},#{pw},#{email},#{phone}, null, sysdate(),1,#{name})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
select max(rec_seq) as max_rec_seq FROM ccu.record_info where id = #{param1}
select event_at,event_content from ccu.event_info where rec_seq=#{rec_seq};
select ei.event_img from ccu.event_info ei inner join ccu.record_info ri ON ei.rec_seq = ri.rec_seq inner join ccu.user_info ui ON ri.id = ui.id where ui.id = #{param1};
